testcase.name: Check achievements
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I am Authorized user✅ When I click 'Main menu icon' button✅ And I click 'Predictor' link✅ Then I expect to see loading screen ✅ Given I click '3 dots icon Predictor' button✅ And I click 'Achievements Predictor' button✅ Then I expect to see 'Achievements' screen✅ And I expect to see 'All achievements' tab

testcase.name: Make prediction
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I am Authorized user✅ When I click 'Main menu icon' button✅ And I click 'Predictor' link✅ Then I expect to see loading screen ✅ Given I click 'Match result icon' button on first available match✅ Then I expect to see 'match' popup✅ When I scroll first scrore picker to 3✅ And I scroll second score picker to 1✅ Then I expect to see score '1-3' ✅ When I click 'Save prediction' button✅ Then I expect to see message 'Prediction saved' ✅ And I expect to see score '1-3' ✅ When I click 'Play 2x booster' button✅ Then I expect to see that booster activated

testcase.name: Delete prediction
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I am Authorized user✅ When I click 'Main menu icon' button✅ And I click 'Predictor' link✅ Then I expect to see loading screen ✅ Given I click 'Match result icon' button on first available match✅ Then I expect to see 'match' popup✅ When I click 'Reset prediction' button✅ Then I expect to see message 'Prediction deleted' ✅ And I expect ot see empty match score

testcase.name: Create League
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I am Authorized user✅ When I click 'Main menu icon' button✅ And I click 'Predictor' link✅ Then I expect to see loading screen ✅ Given I click 'Leagues Predictor' button✅ Then I expect to see 'Leagues' screen✅ When I click 'Create a league Predictor' button✅ Then I expect to see 'Create a league' popup✅ When I enter 'TestLeague Predictor' as a league name✅ And I click 'Create league Predictor' button✅ Then I expect to see message box 'You created a league' ✅ When I click 'Arrow icon Predictor' button✅ Then I expect to see 'Leagues' screen

testcase.name: Edit and Delete league
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I am Authorized user✅ When I click 'Main menu icon' button✅ And I click 'Predictor' link✅ Then I expect to see loading screen ✅ Given I click 'Leagues Predictor' button✅ Then I expect to see 'Leagues' screen✅ When I click 'View league' button✅ Then I expect to see 'TestLeague' screen✅ When I click 'Settings icon Predictor' button✅ Then I expect to see 'League settings' screen✅ When I click 'Edit settings' button✅ And I delete my league name Predictor✅ And I enter "TestLeague1" as new league name Predictor✅ And I click 'Done settings' button✅ Then I expect to see that league name to be changed to "TestLeague1" ✅ When I click 'Delete league Predictor' button✅ Then I expect to see 'warning league' popup✅ When I click 'Yes, delete' button✅ Then I expect to see message box 'You delete this league' ✅ And I expect to see 'Leagues' screen
